data.query: SELECT ball, stuff, speed, zonex, zoney, x, y from baseball.pitzone WHERE gmkey = '{0}' AND batorder = '{1}' AND ballcount = '{2}' AND batter = '{3}' AND pitcher = '{4}' LIMIT 1
SELECT Stadium, Vteam, Hteam, Umpc, Ump1, Ump2, Ump3, Mois, Weath, Wind, Crowd, Chajun, Temp FROM baseball.gameinfo WHERE GmKey = '{0}'
